Policybazaar Insurance Brokers Pvt. Limited
Walkins.description: Candidate should be a Graduate with minimum 1 year of experience in BPO Recruitment, Bulk Hiring Roles & Responsibilities- To achieve the target assigned within agreed quality & timelines. Independently manage recruitment for all positions across all verticals. Co-ordinate/ liaison with placement consultants/ institutions etc. Conducting skill testing & interviews Planning & Sourcing for specific recruitment within defined time frames Ensuring that documentation and salary fitment is as per agreed guidelines, to maintain Green status in compliance front Contribute to creating an organizational image, which would help in attracting and recruiting the best talent Seek to expand the talent pool by evaluating new employee profiles and assess their suitability Stakeholder management What do we offer? Amazing work culture Complete Day shift 6 Days working Shift Timing - 10:00 AM to 07:00 PM Walk-in Date/ Time: 5th February 2021, 11.00 AM - 4.00 PM Interview Venue- Policybazaar Insurance Brokers Pvt.
